comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: TexKap and all: It is certainly a striking image, and one that is part of a larger series of images of Ella Watson taken by Gordon Parks over the course of nearly a month. The story behind the images is as interesting as the photos themselves. A bit about Mr. Parks, his work with the Farm Security Administration and specifically this series of images can be found here on the Library's website: Ella Watson, U.S. Government Charwoman, Photographer: Gordon Parks.

comment._content: American Gothic with many demographic traits
